question.title: Java ServiceLoader loads in Java22, but not in Java23
question.body:
I have a program that uses ServiceLoader, which works fine in Java22, but does not load anything in Java23.

Where can I find out about differences in behaviour between the two different versions.

And what is the best way to debug ServiceLoader. At the moment I only know it's finding anything to load.

The code looks like this.

public void loadPlugins() {
    ServiceLoader<EPlugBase> serviceLoader = ServiceLoader.load(EPlugBase.class);
    msgMainListener.Send(new EMsgData.Builder().setType(EMsgData.MsgType.DEBUG).setSender(this).setText("Service Loader: " + serviceLoader.toString() + "\n").build());
    Integer count = 0;

    for (EPlugBase plugin : serviceLoader) {
        LOG.log(Level.INFO, "load plug {0}", plugin.getName());
        count++;
        msgMainListener.Send(new EMsgData.Builder().setType(EMsgData.MsgType.PLUGINLOAD).setSender(this).setData(new EPair(jarinfos.size(), count)).setText(plugin.getName()).build());
        msgMainListener.Send(new EMsgData.Builder().setType(EMsgData.MsgType.DEBUG).setSender(this).setText(plugin.getName()).build());
        plugins.add(plugin);
        // set the message listener
        plugin.setMsgListener((EMsgData msg) -> msgListener(msg));
        // init will return a List of listeners that are added to downlisteners
        downlisteners.addAll(plugin.init(frame, datamodules));
        // add any settings panels to the dialog
        settingsDialog.addPanels(plugin.getSettingPanels());
        // add menu stuff for this plugin
        buildMenus(plugin);
    }

This code is in a jar, that is called used by the main program jar. At present I am running this in Netbeans IDE.

I recompiled the code with Java23 to arrive at the issue. When compiled with Java22 it works ok.
